update t_mexc_entrust set status = #{upinfo.status}, trade_remain_number=trade_remain_number-#{upinfo.tradedNumber}, trade_remain_amount=trade_remain_amount-#{upinfo.tradedAmount}, update_by=#{upinfo.updateBy}, updare_by_name=#{upinfo.updateByName}, update_time=#{upinfo.updateTime} where id = #{upinfo.id} and (status = 3 or status = 1) and trade_remain_number-#{upinfo.tradedNumber} >=0 and trade_remain_amount-#{upinfo.tradedAmount} >=0

member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
market_id = #{marketId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
market_name = #{marketName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
trade_vcoin_id = #{tradeVcoinId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

trade_price = #{tradePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
trade_avg_price = #{tradeAvgPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
trade_number = #{tradeNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
trade_remain_number = #{tradeRemainNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
trade_remain_amount = #{tradeRemainAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
trade_total_amount = #{tradeTotalAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
trade_rate = #{tradeRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
trade_fee = #{tradeFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
trade_type = #{tradeType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updare_by_name = #{updareByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by_name = #{createByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (status = 1 or status = 3) and trade_remain_number > 0
mapper.select: SELECT trade_no, trade_price, trade_number, trade_remain_number, member_id, create_time, market_id, trade_vcoin_id, trade_type FROM t_mexc_entrust where market_id=#{matchOrderQuery.marketId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and trade_vcoin_id=#{matchOrderQuery.vcoinId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status in (${matchOrderQuery.status}) and trade_type=#{matchOrderQuery.tradeType,jdbcType=INTEGER} and trade_price = #{matchOrderQuery.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL} order by create_time ASC
mapper.update: update t_mexc_entrust set mq_status=1 where trade_no=#{tradeNo} and mq_status!=1
